metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21270 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Versions less than 0.0.6 of the Node.js stringstream module are vulnerableto an out-of-bounds read because of allocation of uninitialized bufferswhen a number is passed in the input stream (when using Node.js 4.x).

criterions.comment: node-stringstream: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
